title: Reach U.S. Consumers Ready to Book European and UK Vacations!Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Reach U.S. Consumers Ready to Book European and UK Vacations!
Place your destination in front of tens of thousands of American travelers looking to travel to Europe and the UK on their next international adventure. As the only consumer-facing travel trade show series in the United States, only the Travel & Adventure Show Series can deliver an audience of affluent, ready-to-buy travel enthusiasts right to YOU.
In fact, 86% of attendees stated that their number one destination of interest, was Europe. With all 7 show locations providing easy airlift access to international destinations, you can count on maximizing visibility, increasing ROI and meeting qualified travel agents and consumers.
By the Numbers:
91% of attendees will take one or more international trips in the next 12 months 96% are passport holders
67% took 1 or more international trips in the past 12 months 75% are interested in international travel 72% of attendees spent over $2,000 on each trip booked after meeting an exhibitor at the event
It is estimated that only 1/3 of US travelers will utilize a travel agent when making their future vacation plans. Despite this, we understand this is an important channel of business for European and UK travel suppliers. Our 7 events brought in over 3,300 travel agents in 2015 seeking to make new contacts and create new itineraries to make available to their loyal clients.
Take advantage of the premier U.S. consumer marketing outlet in the travel industry and enjoy a special discounted rate as a member of ETOA. Don’t miss your opportunity to reach over 135,000 ready-to-book travel enthusiasts, only at the Travel & Adventure Show Series!
What a recent exhibiting ETOA member had to say about his first experience in our 2015 event in Long Beach (LA), CA:
“The Travel & Adventure Show in Los Angeles was a great success for Prestigious Travel UK. We really enjoyed meeting so many people interested in international travel and talking with them about the fantastic locations of the United Kingdom. The quality of Travel Agents that also visit is exceptional. As a result of the show and my trip to LA, we have secured over $100,000 worth of new business from both trade and consumers, and are looking forward to welcoming our first U.S. Group on September 27th , who are embarking on a 12 day Stately Home visit around the UK. We are looking forward to returning in 2016 and exhibiting in Washington, DC and Los Angeles.” – John Calthorpe, Managing Director, Prestigious Travel UK
